Reviews.Title: Am Not Sure
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I cannot fully review the cameras as I am waiting for the weather to break to install them.  I have opened the package and tried one of the cameras and they operate very easily and are very clear even in the dark.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use system functions just like a computer; View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Receive email alerts, with photo, when motion is detected on your property; Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space; 600TVL Ultra Hi-Res cameras provide crisp and detailed video
36IR LEDs for up to 100ft automatic night vision; Weather-resistant camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather
Anti-vandal mount ensures camera cables cannot be tampered with; Easily connect to DVR with 65-foot cables (16 included)
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT 8CH Smart Security DVR with 8 Ultra Hi-Res Outdoor 100ft Night Vision Cameras with IR Cut Filter 500GB HDD & Smartphone Compatibility (11025) - Bonus 8 Pack of Camera Extension Cables Included
